cluster.name: Smoke CO Alarm
cluster.description: This cluster provides an interface for observing and managing the state of smoke and CO alarms.

values.name: Normal
values.summary: Nominal state, the device is not alarming
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is not alarming.

values.name: Warning
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is in a warning state. Alarms in this state SHOULD be subject to being muted via physical interaction.

values.name: Critical
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is in a critical state. Alarms in this state SHALL NOT be subject to being muted via physical interaction.

values.name: Normal
values.summary: Nominal state, the device is not alarming
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is not alarming.

values.name: SmokeAlarm
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is currently expressing visual indication of Smoke Alarm. This value SHALL indicate that the alarm is currently expressing audible indication of Smoke Alarm unless the DeviceMuted attribute is supported and set to Muted.

values.name: COAlarm
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is currently expressing visual indication of CO Alarm. This value SHALL indicate that the alarm is currently expressing audible indication of CO Alarm unless the DeviceMuted attribute is supported and set to Muted.

values.name: BatteryAlert
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is currently expressing visual indication of Critical Low Battery. This value SHALL indicate that the alarm is currently expressing audible indication of Critical Low Battery unless the DeviceMuted attribute is supported and set to Muted.

values.name: Testing
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is currently expressing visual and audible indication of SelfTest.

values.name: HardwareFault
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is currently expressing visual indication of Hardware Fault. This value SHALL indicate that the alarm is currently expressing audible indication of Hardware Fault unless the DeviceMuted attribute is supported and set to Muted.

values.name: EndOfService
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is currently expressing visual indication of End Of Service. This value SHALL indicate that the alarm is currently expressing audible indication of End of Service unless the DeviceMuted attribute is supported and set to Muted.

values.name: InterconnectSmoke
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is currently expressing visual indication of Smoke Alarm caused by Interconnect. This value SHALL indicate that the alarm is currently expressing audible indication of Smoke Alarm caused by Interconnect unless the DeviceMuted attribute is supported and set to Muted.

values.name: InterconnectCO
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that this alarm is currently expressing visual indication of CO Alarm caused by Interconnect. This value SHALL indicate that the alarm is currently expressing audible indication of CO Alarm caused by Interconnect unless the DeviceMuted attribute is supported and set to Muted.

values.name: Expired
values.summary: Device has reached its end of service
values.description: This value SHALL indicate that the device has reached its end of service, and needs to be replaced.

values.name: Normal
values.summary: Nominal state, the sensor is not contaminated

values.name: Critical
values.summary: Critical state, will cause nuisance alarms

attributes.name: ExpressedState
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the visibly- and audibly-expressed state of the alarm. When multiple alarm conditions are being reflected in the server, this attribute SHALL indicate the condition with the highest priority.

attributes.name: SmokeState
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the device's smoke sensor is currently triggering a smoke alarm.

attributes.name: COState
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the device's CO sensor is currently triggering a CO alarm.

attributes.name: BatteryAlert
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the power resource fault detection mechanism is currently triggered at the device.

attributes.name: DeviceMuted
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the whether the audible expression of the device is currently muted.

attributes.name: TestInProgress
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the device self-test is currently activated.

attributes.name: HardwareFaultAlert
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the hardware fault detection mechanism is currently triggered.

attributes.name: EndOfServiceAlert
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the end-of-service has been triggered at the device.

attributes.name: InterconnectSmokeAlarm
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the interconnected smoke alarm is currently triggering by branching devices.

attributes.name: InterconnectCOAlarm
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the interconnected CO alarm is currently triggering by branching devices.

attributes.name: ContaminationState
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the contamination level of the smoke sensor.

attributes.name: SmokeSensitivityLevel
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the sensitivity level of the smoke sensor configured on the device.

attributes.name: ExpiryDate
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the date by which the device should be replaced.

commands.name: SelfTestRequest
commands.description: This command SHALL initiate a device self-test. The return status SHALL indicate whether the test was successfully initiated.

events.name: SmokeAlarm
events.description: This event SHALL be generated when SmokeState attribute changes to either Warning or Critical state.

fields.name: AlarmSeverityLevel
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the current value of the SmokeState attribute.

events.name: COAlarm
events.description: This event SHALL be generated when COState attribute changes to either Warning or Critical state.

fields.name: AlarmSeverityLevel
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the current value of the COState attribute.
